description: This source file is the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports React dependencies, the root CSS, and the main App component, then initializes and renders the React application into the DOM element with id 'root'.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for the React application in the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React element into the root DOM node.
